newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Infinity Financial starts.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Infinity Financial starts.

text.p: -- Deutsche Morgan Grenfell said on Wednesday it had started coverage of Infinity Financial Technology Inc with a rating of buy.
-- Analyst Mark Wolfenberger set an 18-month price target of $32 a share, up 103 percent from its current level.

-- "We believe the company is exceptionally well positioned to benefit from the rising demand generated by the global financial markets for risk managment and analytical systems," he wrote in an analysis.
-- "Because the company delivers an open platform, we believe INFN can become the industry's de facto standard for managing risk and other types of on-line analysis needs."
-- The Mountain View, Calif., company's stock rose one point to 16-3/4 in early trade.
